snippet: PEARLMAN--Sylvia D.,of New York City, New York on June 15, 2016 at the age of 89 years. Widow of Bernard Pearlman. Survived by her two sons, Allan and Robert, and grandson Daniel. Funeral service will be held on Monday June 20, 2016, 11am at Schwartz Brothers-Jeffer Memorial Chapel, 114-03 Queens Boulevard, Forest Hills, NY. Interment at Calverton National Cemetery, Calverton, NY. 1/3
